text: Magnus Nordborg is a biologist specialising in population genetics. He is the scientific director of the Gregor Mendel Institute of the Austrian Academy of Sciences, located at the Vienna Biocenter. == Awards and honours == In 2003, Nordborg received the Sloan Research Fellowship. He was elected a fellow of the American Association for the Advancement of Science in 2010. In 2015, he was elected a member of the European Molecular Biology Organization. Since 2013, he is a corresponding member of the Austrian Academy of Sciences. == References == == External links == * Category:Living people Category:Population geneticists Category:Lund University alumni Category:Stanford University alumni Category:University of Southern California faculty Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Magnus Nordborg
